title: Mount Zion (New York)
text: Mount Zion is a small <a href="mountain">mountain</a> chain in the <a href="Central%20New%20York">Central New York</a> region of <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a>. It is located southwest of <a href="Otego%20%28town%29%2C%20New%20York%23Communities%20and%20locations%20in%20the%20Town%20of%20Otego">Otego, New York</a>. It is made of two main peaks. One is in <a href="Otsego%20County%2C%20New%20York">Otsego County</a> and the other, being the tallest at 1988 feet, in <a href="Delaware%20County%2C%20New%20York">Delaware County</a>.
